00041 using namespace Hypertable;
00042 using namespace Config;
00043 using namespace std;

00045 namespace {
00046 
00047   const char *usage =
00048     "\n"
00049     "Usage: ht_rsclient [options] <host>[:<port>]\n\nOptions"
00050     ;
00051 
00052   struct AppPolicy : Policy {
00053     static void init_options() {
00054       cmdline_desc(usage).add_options()
00055         ("no-hyperspace", "Do not establish a connection to hyperspace")
00056         ;
00057       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("rs-location", str(), "");
00058       cmdline_positional_desc().add("rs-location", -1);
00059     }
00060     static void init() {
00061       if (has("rs-location")) {
00062         Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("rs-location"));
00063         properties->set("rs-host", e.host);
00064         if (e.port) properties->set("rs-port", e.port);
00065       }
00066     }
00067   };
00068 
00069   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, CommandShellPolicy, HyperspaceClientPolicy,
00070           RangeServerClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00071 
00072   class RangeServerDispatchHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00073   public:
00074     RangeServerDispatchHandler() : m_connected(false) { return; }
00075     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00076       if (event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00077         if (!m_connected) {
00078           cout << "Unable to establish connection to range server" << endl;
00079           _exit(0);
00080         }
00081       }
00082       else if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED)
00083         m_connected = true;
00084     }
00085   private:
00086     bool m_connected;
00087   };
00088 
00089 } // local namespace
00090 
00091 
00092 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00093   int error = 1;
00094   bool no_hyperspace = false;
00095 
00096   try {
00097     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00098 
00099     int timeout = get_i32("timeout");
00100     InetAddr addr(get_str("rs-host"), get_i16("rs-port"));
00101 
00102     if (has("no-hyperspace"))
00103       no_hyperspace = true;
00104 
00105     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00106 
00107     // Create Range Server client object
00108     RangeServerClientPtr client = new RangeServerClient(comm, timeout);
00109 
00110     DispatchHandlerPtr dispatch_handler_ptr = new RangeServerDispatchHandler();
00111     // connect to RangeServer
00112     if ((error = comm->connect(addr, dispatch_handler_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00113       cerr << "error: unable to connect to RangeServer "<< addr << endl;
00114       _exit(1);
00115     }
00116 
00117     poll(0, 0, 100);
00118 
00119     // Maybe connect to Hyperspace
00120     Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspace;
00121     if (!no_hyperspace) {
00122       hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(comm, properties, 0);
00123       if (!hyperspace->wait_for_connection(timeout))
00124         _exit(1);
00125     }
00126 
00127     CommandInterpreterPtr interp =
00128         new RangeServerCommandInterpreter(comm, hyperspace, addr, client);
00129 
00130     CommandShellPtr shell = new CommandShell("rsclient", interp, properties);
00131 
00132     error = shell->run();
00133   }
00134   catch (Exception &e) {
00135     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00136     _exit( e.code() );
00137   }
00138   _exit(error);
00139 }
